'''Kalei''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A spy keeping tabs on the Vailian Trading Company, Kalei is essentially the recruiter for the [RDC](/rdc/), seeking promising people to enlist to the aid of the great kingdom - especially those not predisposed towards helping the competition.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Coming to Terms](/comingToTerms/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Coming to Terms](/comingToTerms/): She approaches you after the quest ends, inviting you to visit the RDC operation.
